item.title: How to use wget, sed and gawk to get a description of the DBA_ views
item.description: I’m studying for Oracle certification, and I thought it would be handy to get a cribsheet list of all of the DBA_ views and what they are for. Rather than create this manually, I did the following. Downloaded the top level contents wget -r -l1 -k http://download.oracle.com/docs/cd/B19306_01/server.102/b14237/toc.htm wget gets pages from the web. ‘-r’ says to also retrieve links. ‘-l1’ says to only get one level of links (i.e. get the pages linked to from the first page, but don’t get the pages linked to by them).
